scripts.test: npm run beforetest && cross-env ENV=qa BROWSER=chrome HEADLESS=true Type=Web cucumber-js --format json:./reports/chrome/cucumber-report.json --tags @loginPageSauce || true && npx ts-node src/helper/reporter/reports.ts chrome && npm run send-report chrome
scripts.testFirefox: npm run beforetest && cross-env ENV=qa BROWSER=firefox HEADLESS=false Type=Web cucumber-js --tags @loginTest || true && npm run run-all chrome
scripts.testWebkit: npx ts-node src/helper/reporter/init.ts && cross-env ENV=qa BROWSER=webkit HEADLESS=false Type=Web cucumber-js --tags @loginTest || true  && npm run run-all chrome
scripts.test:chrome: npm run beforetest && cross-env ENV=qa BROWSER=chrome HEADLESS=true Type=Web cucumber-js --format json:./reports/chrome/cucumber-report.json --tags @failedScenario || true && npx ts-node src/helper/reporter/reports.ts chrome
scripts.test:firefox: cross-env ENV=qa BROWSER=firefox HEADLESS=true Type=Web cucumber-js --format json:./reports/firefox/cucumber-report.json --tags @failedScenario || true  && npx ts-node src/helper/reporter/reports.ts firefox
scripts.test:webkit: cross-env ENV=qa BROWSER=webkit HEADLESS=true Type=Web cucumber-js --format json:./reports/webkit/cucumber-report.json --tags @failedScenario || true  && npx ts-node src/helper/reporter/reports.ts webkit
scripts.testAllBrowsers: npm run beforetest && npm-run-all --parallel test:chrome test:firefox test:webkit  && npm run send-report all
scripts.demo: cross-env ENV=qa BROWSER=chrome HEADLESS=true Type=Web cucumber-js --tags @loginTest || true
scripts.test:API: cross-env ENV=qa Type=API cucumber-js --format json:./reports/API/cucumber-report.json -p api || true
scripts.posttest:API: npx ts-node src/helper/reporter/reports_API.ts && npx cross-env ENV=qa ts-node src/helper/email/run.ts API
